comment: Easy class. Very organized and detailed. Makes frequent announcement so that his students stay on track. Great professor.

He's nice and laid back, but maybe a little too much. Went through half the semester not knowing where I stood in class because he took so long to post grades. But overall, I'm glad I stuck through it.

While the professor may be the most disorganized I have ever had, he makes up for it with his grading policy. For every day after 5 business days he fails to return something, he gives you 1 point on the overall grade for that assignment. he ended up giving us 100's on over 30% of our grade because of how long it took him to grade.
Wonderful person, great teacher! Very practical, helpful and useful information, eye opening class! He's great for minimester class!
Not a bad teacher...Pretty easy tests if you ask me. I would definitely reccomend taking him.

Very disorganized is his big downfall. You never know how he is going to grade you. Doesnt return e-mails or projects for a long time. He seemed to lose interest in the class about half way through. I felt I deserved an A with all my grades but got a B and not sure why.

Horrible. He never turns assignments back to us on time, and he has not once emailed me back any of the times I have emailed him. He also makes you sign a contract that says you won't use your computer for anything other than BISM stuff. But he's not hard.
Very nice and helpful prof.  Really tries to make a boring subject interesting.  VERY fair.  class is harder than I imagined but he is great.  Would highly recommend!!

Cool guy, easy class, open book and open note tests. Easy but lenghty tests. Presentation is easy as heck too. This guy is recommended though he is definately a slacker when it comes to grading tests. Overall the professor is recommended highly.

Very informative in a relaxed and fun atmosphere. Learned a lot and enjoyed the group project. The tests were take home and a little tough to fit into the time limit but Arjan was helpful in pointing out how to do better next time.  The case studies were relevant to the topics. Great class and great teacher!

There is a lot of busy work in the class, but it is all relevant.  The project is kinda big too.  His tests are open book, so you need only demonstrate that you understand the topics (yet some still score low somehow).  He does a decent job teaching a class that is really dry.  Information systems management is really, really dry......
He seems to be hard, but hes tests are good...
